results.title: Nephrotic Syndrome in a Child With NPHS2 Mutation.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Tacrolimus @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016559 @@@Tacrolimus@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ were added to therapy pending results of genetic testing.
